page_content:
Manage AAA File

Version:MissionOS_2.0

Manage AAA File functionality has the capability to upload and download Review files in bulk in the MissionOS application.

To reach the Manage AAA File interface, perform the following steps:

  1. Log into the MissionOS portal.
  2. Open the Data Manager.

 

In Data Manager, navigate to System Management. Select Utilities, and then click Manage AAA File to open the corresponding interface.

Here you can see two tabs – AAA File Upload and AAA File Download which does the functions of upload and download of AAA files respectively. The AAA File Upload tab is open by default.

Initially you must download the sample file template for entering data available in excel format, after which you can follow the upload process.

Follow the steps below to download sample template and then upload review files:

  1. Select Regime as AAA and select Review Type from dropdown - Both, Upper or Lower based on requirement.
  2. Select checkbox – Is Relative if you require data entries where Both is selected and Upper and Lower values are the same irrespective of the sign. This checkbox is not displayed on selection of Upper or Lower.

 

 

  1. Click Download AAA Sample File.
    An excel file template opens in another tab of your browser. You can see that it contains various review data fields.
  2. Click the Download File button to download the file into your system.
  3. Now click open the excel file.
  4. Enter the instrument review data you desire to upload.
    Note:
    Under the column heading Review Field, enter the User Field Labels of review data.
  5. Once you complete the entries, click Save to save the file.
  6. Upload the file through the AAA File Upload interface by clicking Choose File and then Upload.

The review file successfully uploads into the application and the Status shows as Success or Updated.

 

Follow the steps below to download review files:

  1. To download AAA file of an instrument, click open the AAA File Download tab.
  2. Select the required fields:
  • Object Type
  • Object Subtype
  • Project
  • Contract
  • Site
  • Zone
  • Review Type
  1. Click Search Objects.
    This results in the listing of objects under the selected Object Type.
  2. Select the object for which download data is required. To select multiple objects, press the Ctrl key and select the objects with the mouse cursor.

 

  1. Then, click the Download AAA Data The AAA Data file containing review data of selected objects opens to a new tab in your browser.
  2. Click Download File and then Open file to view the file in your system.

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on How to Manage AAA File in MissionOS, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:
